programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di's father gets kidnapped by loan sharks, which inevitably forces Jan Di's mother to swallow her pride and plead for Madam Kang's help.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: The F4 guys have moved on to college while Jan Di has entered her senior year of high school. She has not heard from Jun Pyo since he left.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di waits to hear the conclusions of F3's meeting with Jun-pyo, and can tell from their look that it was not good.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di's family hears about Jun-pyo's engagement and asks her miserably if it's true.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Ji-hoo can see how hurt Jan Di is by the kiss, and continues to follow her as she stumbles around in shock.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo begins seeing Jae-Kyung in a new light, like he's seeing her for the first time as a potential friend -- or maybe a kindred spirit.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Woo-bin tries to talk some sense into Yi-jung, who is determined to drink himself into a stupor.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: At home, Jun-hee reminisces about how her mother meddled in her life, in much the same way she's interfering in Jun-pyo's now.

programme.title: The House of Us
programme.desc: A girl from a troubled family befriends two younger girls and begins to feel a sense of normalcy as they go adventuring at the seaside.

programme.desc: Lu Xiaoman finds Cen Huan and ties her with a silk thread to lead her back to Jishitang.

programme.desc: A marriage is interrupted by an unlucky sighting of a ghostly procession.

programme.desc: To save Sima Kongkong, the group must find the cruel Empress Huanxi.

programme.desc: Empress gifts the group some of her spiritual grass and reveals a conspiracy about Luo Hu.

programme.desc: Cen Huan and Ning Weiyu journey to a manor, where they save a girl in despair.

programme.desc: A battle over lives ensues between the Dream-Eating and the Dream-Creating.

programme.desc: Ning Weiyu can't suppress his curiosity about Cen Huan's real identity.
